data.name: X-Plane 11 - Add-on: MSK Productions - Sharjah Intl Airport
data.detailed_description:
MSK production presents first rendition of the Sharjah International Airport, UAE – X-Plane 11 (ICAO: OMSJ).

Sharjah Intl Airport is located 7 NM east-southeast of Sharjah, UAE. Sharjah Airport is the third largest Middle East airfreight hub in cargo tonnage. Sharjah International Airport is home base of the low cost carrier, Air Arabia.

The following airlines operate regular scheduled and charter flights to and from Sharjah:
  • Air Arabia
  • Airblue
  • Air India
  • Air India Express
  • Air Peace
  • Cham Wings Airlines
  • EgyptAir
  • IndiGo
  • Jazeera Airways
  • Pakistan International Airlines
  • Pegasus Airlines
  • Rossiya Airlines
  • SCAT Airlines
  • SkyUp
  • Syrian Air
  • Turkish Airlines
  • Uzbekistan Airways
  • DHL Aviation EgyptAir Cargo Ethiopian Cargo Lufthansa Cargo Singapore Airlines Cargo UPS Airlines


  • All major airport buildings included
  • Taxiway signs, and other small details
  • Numerous static objects such as service vehicles
  • Very detailed taxiways and runways alongwith PBR textures
  • Animated Ground Vehicles
  • Very good frame rates
  • Night Lighting Included
  • High Definition ground texture files
  • Special Specular and Reflective textures used for ground
